mapper.insert: insert into submit_code (user_id, problem_id, code_value, code_type, font_size, theme) values(#{userId}, #{problemId}, #{codeValue}, #{codeType}, #{fontSize}, #{theme});
mapper.update: update submit_code set status = #{status} where submit_code_id = #{submitCodeId};
update submit_code set status = 'compiling' where submit_code_id = #{submitCodeId} and status = 'waiting';
update submit_code set test_num = #{testNumber} where submit_code_id = #{submitCodeId};
mapper.select: select a.problem_id, problem_name, code_type, b.user_name, status, submit_time, judge_test_num, test_num from submit_code a left join user b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join problem c on a.problem_id = c.problem_id order BY a.submit_time desc limit #{page}, #{limit};
select submit_code_id, code_type, code_value, problem_id from submit_code where status = 'waiting' order by submit_time limit 1;
select problem_id as problemId from submit_code where submit_code_id = #{submitCodeId};
select judge_test_num, test_num from submit_code where submit_code_id = #{submitCodeId};
select status from run_code where submit_code_id = #{submitCodeId};
select code_value, code_type, font_size, theme from submit_code where user_id = #{userId} and problem_id = #{problemId} order by submit_time desc limit #{limit};
select count(1) from submit_code where user_id = #{userId} and problem_id = #{problemId} and status = 'AC';
